title: Is Tahm's stomach bottomless?
body: On just really big?...because he ate parts of a palace plus presents and a full grown woman in his teaser...

replies.body:
That explains how he can eat CHO and ZAC. 

However I think hes a lesser version of a better known DEVOURER... Stiches. At lvl 20 you can upgrade his ULT to EAT MULTIPLE CHAMPS. You can swallow the whole team, imagine the biggest champs all in your stomach at once.

Now thats funny and truly 'endless'. Tahm... not so much. I dont think he could eat a Tower, for example. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eacHel0W9j8

Maybe it is as bottomless as despair can be?

(Not official canon answer, etc. etc. but it seems right for Tahm to me.)

I'd like to think his digestive fluids are just really strong on non-living substances.

Must melt a lot of clothes when he swallows another Champion. XD

Considering he's a walking catfish, with a better vocabulary than most of these days college students . . . it may as well be! My question though, if his devour is the killing strike, why does he spit out the corpse? Fizz' shark doesn't.

{{champion:223}} "Disgusting!"

That is what he says(among other things) when he eats a champ.

What's important to remember is that the Tahm Kench you see is just the surface of the great river that the River King represents. It's not all of him and just looking at the body and asking about it is missing the point of who and what he truly is.
I know but still, you have to wonder _where _ things go when he does eat them.

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/villains/images/1/11/20110924094946!Gluttony_is_hungry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140901211929
Those who have watched Fullmetal Alchemist (specifically Brotherhood) know how Gluttony works, and Tahm Kench may be similar. But just in case someone hasn't watched it, I won't spoil things. Please watch FMA!

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

its like kirby u kno he's got a crossroads demon pocket dimension in there.
like kirby without the demon parts
yeah
The thing you see is not Tahm Kench, just an embodiment. He has no a certain body. He can look as whatever he wants. If he wanted, he could look a like a classic demon portrait.
I know that. But I'm not sure that explains it. like _where_ does everything go?
He is a Demon in disguise so Tahm Kench could be extremely powerful and have a limitless stomach. He could very well be able to eat anything that the world houses.
Chogath is bottomless and Tahm can eat Chogath.
he cant eat blue or buff but he can eat a 6 stacked chogath which is bigger than blue buff
